DESCRIPTION:
WARNING: Cog optionally edits economy.py's bank.json file to let the bot recieve economy points
WARNING: Cog uses economy.py to edit it's users' bank balance.

Trickles economy.py currency to active users. Because economy.py's bank is cross-server, cross-server users may begin to horde a lot of currency ;)
NAME: WARNING: read cog info. Silently trickles economy.py's currency points to active users
